Color Crunch

Casual strategy game in which you have 60 seconds to build colored chains - and crunch them!

Perfect for those boring journeys, simply tap the grid to place the next tile in the queue. Get 3 or more tiles next to each other and tap them to crunch them!

Longer chains = more points.
